header.title: Installation Verification

chapter.p: This chapter is about verifying your installation by performing a simple test to see that your system is properly installed.

item.p: Start Erlang/OTP by double-clicking on the Erlang shortcut icon on the desktop.
Expect a command line window to pop up with an output looking something like this:
Exit by entering the command halt(),
which should close the command line window and stop Erlang/OTP.
